xplane_ui.py

Creates the User Interface for all X-Plane settings.

Summary
xplane_ui.pyCreates the User Interface for all X-Plane settings.
LAMP_PT_xplaneAdds X-Plane lamp settings to the lamp tab.
MATERIAL_PT_xplaneAdds X-Plane Material settings to the material tab.
SCENE_PT_xplaneAdds X-Plane Layer settings to the scene tab.
OBJECT_PT_xplaneAdds X-Plane settings to the object tab.
BONE_PT_xplaneAdds X-Plane settings to the bone tab.
OBJECT_MT_xplane_datarefsAdds the X-Plane datarefs search menu.
Functions
scene_layoutDraws the UI layout for scene tabs.
layer_layoutDraws the UI layout for XPlaneLayers.
custom_layer_layoutDraws the UI layout for the custom attributes of a XPlaneLayer.
mesh_layoutDraws the additional UI layout for Mesh-Objects.
lamp_layoutDraws the UI layout for lamps.
material_layoutDraws the UI layout for materials.
custom_layoutDraws the additional UI layout for custom attributes.
animation_layoutDraws the UI layout for animations.
cockpit_layoutDraws the UI layout for cockpit parameters.
manipulator_layoutDraws the UI layout for manipulator settings.
lod_layoutDraws the UI for Levels of detail
weight_layoutDraws the UI for Object weight
parseDatarefsParses the DataRefs.txt file which is located within the io_xplane2blender addon directory and stores results in a list.
showErrorDraws a window displaying an error message.
showProgressDraws a progress bar together with a message.
addXPlaneUIRegisters all UI Panels.
removeXPlaneUIUnregisters all UI Panels.

LAMP_PT_xplane

Adds X-Plane lamp settings to the lamp tab.  Uses <lamp_layout> and <custom_layout>.

MATERIAL_PT_xplane

Adds X-Plane Material settings to the material tab.  Uses <material_layout> and <custom_layout>.

SCENE_PT_xplane

Adds X-Plane Layer settings to the scene tab.  Uses <scene_layout>.

OBJECT_PT_xplane

Adds X-Plane settings to the object tab.  Uses <mesh_layout>, <cockpit_layout>, <manipulator_layout> and <custom_layout>.

BONE_PT_xplane

Adds X-Plane settings to the bone tab.  Uses <animation_layout>.

OBJECT_MT_xplane_datarefs

Adds the X-Plane datarefs search menu.  This is not implemented yet.

Functions

Functions

scene_layout

def scene_layout(self,
scene)

Draws the UI layout for scene tabs.  Uses layer_layout.

Parameters

selfInstance of current panel class.
sceneBlender scene.

layer_layout

def layer_layout(self,
scene,
layout,
layer)

Draws the UI layout for XPlaneLayers.  Uses custom_layer_layout.

Parameters

UILayout selfInstance of current UILayout.
sceneBlender scene
UILayout layoutInstance of sublayout to use.
int layerXPlaneLayer index.

custom_layer_layout

def custom_layer_layout(self,
layout,
scene,
layer)

Draws the UI layout for the custom attributes of a XPlaneLayer.

Parameters

UILayout selfInstance of current UILayout.
UILayout layoutInstance of sublayout to use.
sceneBlender scene
int layerXPlaneLayer index.

mesh_layout

def mesh_layout(self,
obj)

Draws the additional UI layout for Mesh-Objects.  This includes light-level and depth-culling.

Parameters

UILayout selfInstance of current UILayout.
objBlender object.

lamp_layout

def lamp_layout(self,
obj)

Draws the UI layout for lamps.

Parameters

UILayout selfInstance of current UILayout.
objBlender object.

material_layout

def material_layout(self,
obj)

Draws the UI layout for materials.

Parameters

UILayout selfInstance of current UILayout.
objBlender object.

custom_layout

def custom_layout(self,
obj,
type)

Draws the additional UI layout for custom attributes.

Parameters

UILayout selfInstance of current UILayout.
objBlender object.
string typeType of object.  (“MESH”,”MATERIAL”,”LAMP”)

animation_layout

def animation_layout(self,  
obj,  
bone =  False)

Draws the UI layout for animations.  This includes Datarefs.

Parameters

UILayout selfInstance of current UILayout.
objBlender object.
bool boneTrue if the object is a bone.

objBlender object.

parseDatarefs

Parses the DataRefs.txt file which is located within the io_xplane2blender addon directory and stores results in a list.  This list should later be used to help search for datarefs with an autocomplete field. def parseDatarefs(): import os search_data = [] filePath = os.path.dirname( file )+’/DataRefs.txt’ if os.path.exists(filePath): try: file = open(filePath,’r’) i = 0 for line in file: if i>1: parts = line.split(‘\t’) if (len(parts)>1 and parts[1] in (‘float’,’int’)): search_data.append(parts[0]) i+=1 except IOError: print(IOError) finally: file.close() return search_data

showError

def showError(message)

Draws a window displaying an error message.

Parameters

string messageThe message to display.

Todos

  • Not working at all.

showProgress

def showProgress(progress,
message)

Draws a progress bar together with a message.

Parameters

float progressvalue between 0 and 1 indicating the current progress.
string messageAn aditional message to display.

Todos

  • Not working at all.

addXPlaneUI

def addXPlaneUI()

Registers all UI Panels.

def removeXPlaneUI()

Unregisters all UI Panels.
